package_info.mp_subtitle: The module that brings a full news system to your website.

mp_description.p:
MelisCmsNews is the News module of Melis Platform.
The module comes with a tool that allows user to manage the list of news, their properties, their images and their texts.
This module is also compatible with MelisCmsSlider, and if both are activated, a slider might be associated to a news and displayed with it.
MelisCmsNews also brings 3 different plugins to be used on pages with drag'n'drop:

- list of news
- latest news
- news detail
All plugins can be configured in order to adjust filters, ordering, etc.
